document_data.name: Dispel Fatigue
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dispel fatigue''''' was a [[necromancy]] spell that alleviated weariness and exhaustion in the recipient.
document_data.Effects: One creature within a range of 90 ft (27.4 m) could be reinvigorated by this spell. All effects of physical and mental exertion were removed, leaving the subject fully rested and refreshed.<ref group="note">The [[Player's Option: Spells & Magic]] describes other systems of magic, including some using "spell points" and "fatigue points". The [[Player's Option: Combat & Tactics]] describes a combat system that uses fatigue points. In those systems, this spell removed all fatigue points from a creature.
document_data.Components: In addition to verbal and somatic components, this spell required a sprinkling of springwater that had been ''[[bless]]ed''.
